explanation: Tanya claims she went directly to the elevator after her board call and left. But Clue 3 reveals her badge accessed the third-floor strategy room at 8:10 PM â€” after her call supposedly ended. She detoured to the strategy room and wiped the whiteboard to force a fresh start on the Q3 plan she disagreed with. Clue 1 confirms a badge swipe at 7:52 PM matching her re-entry.
funFact: The average office whiteboard is erased and rewritten over 50 times a month, making them one of the most contested shared resources in any workplace.
